posts.post_title: FS: 1912 Photo Art Shop Boston Red Sox RPPC...
posts.post_content:
Fantastic postcard with Joe Wood and HOFers Harry Hooper and Tris Speaker.

$975 delivered in the conus, payment via PayPal "friends and family" (established members only) or personal check/bank check/money order.

Commitment to purchase outweighs any inquiries/discussions.

Please send me a PM if interested.  Thank you.
